transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello ha good morning Deepak bhai good morning Vedant ji kaise hain?
Executive: Bahut achcha ho boliye
Customer: Main bhi badhiya sir. main aapko connect isliye kar raha tha ki main thoda sa na
Customer: leads vagaira matlab do char cheeze aur thi jo mujhe aapse discuss karni thi.
Executive: ha ha
Executive: abhi hai online system pe
Customer: abhi to aaj aaj to nahi ho payega kal kyunki mujhe
Executive: sir sir sir mujhe bas aapse do minute chahiye jyada time nahi chahiye wo turant ho jayega jo main aapse karna karna chah raha hun main bahut time nahi lunga main aapka
Customer: okay ha ha
Executive: aapne main aapko matlab verbally aapko bata deta hun matlab ye meeting pe hum baad me kar lenge kyunki abhi aapke pass time nahi hai to aapne
Customer: ye aapne ek product ki lead purchase ki hai tunnel dryer to tunnel dryer me hum deal karte hain kya mujhe to nahi lagta ki tunnel dryer hum deal karte hain.
Customer: matlab kis mein ved mein kis mein kis mein
Executive: aapne kya kiya na aapne lead dher sara purchase kiya hai theek hai Vedant ji usme se kuch teen do teen lead aise purchase kar liya jo hamare product ki nahi hai aur wo product hai tunnel dryer.
Customer: ek second
Executive: main aapko ek bar tunnel dryer dekhiye tunnel dryer ki main wo bhejta hun aapko images bhej raha hun aap khud ek bar check karke bataiye ki ye hamare pass product hai ya nahi ek minute rukiyega
Customer: whatsapp check kijiye
Customer: ye hai hamare pass
Customer: nahi nahi main to sirf check nahi hai ye nahi hai na to main bata raha hun kya karna hai iske liye aap ek bar settings pe jaiye
Customer: setting ha setting open kar lijiye
Customer: ho gaya ho gaya aapne upar me dekhiye last by lead preference karke ek option aa raha hoga sir
Customer: notification setting aa raha hoga account setting aa raha hoga PNS call setting aa raha hoga aur last me aa raha hoga by lead preference
Executive: ha ha
Executive: by lead preference pe click kijiye
Customer: okay kar diya kiya
Executive: ab sabse niche aaiye niche category preference karke aapko ek option aayega us pe click kijiyega sir
Customer: ek minute kya aayega category preference ha aa gaya click kijiye us pe
Executive: ab jaise hi category preference pe click karenge preferred categories aa raha hoga based on your by lead consumption tunnel dryer aa raha hoga sir waha pe
Customer: tunnel dryer ha
Executive: ha usko cross pe click kijiye
Customer: confirm ha confirm kijiye
Customer: ho gaya ab right hand side pe not preferred categories aa raha hoga sir
Executive: ha aaya usme search category to exclude by lead aa raha hai search karne ka option aa raha hoga
Customer: ha ha us pe search kijiye tunnel dryer
Executive: isko hatwana hai matlab waha se main exclude karwa raha hun aapse tunnel dryer aap jaise ha wo niche ek option aa jayega blue colour pe usko pehle select kijiyega theek hai tunnel dryer ko
Customer: fir add pe click kijiyega mila aapko
Customer: confirm aur cancel aa raha hai
Executive: hanji ha usme confirm aur cancel aa raha hai do option aa rahe hain confirm kijiye
Customer: confirm
Executive: ho gaya ek minute rukiyega ha theek hai ab ek bar by leads pe aaiyega sir
Customer: ha by lead aa gaya ha aa gaye waha se by leads pe ha by lead pe search main aapko ek keyword bhej raha hun
Customer: ha ye dried fruit roasting machine karke search kijiye upar upar me recent lead ke upar me ek search ka option aa raha hoga enter product service to search
Customer: kya aa raha hai enter
Executive: ha ha ha usko rehne dijiye usko rehne dijiye waha pe koi lead nahi dikha raha hai abhi dried fruit roasting machine me aap ek kam kijiye lead manager pe aaiye
Customer: lead manager ha ab all contacts ke upar me jo hamburger menu ka option aata hai na jahan se maine list view open karwaya tha aapse
Customer: ha menu pe click kijiye wo triple line ka jo option aata hai menu ka
Executive: ha ha ha us pe click kijiye usme leads ha list view pe jaiye
Customer: ho gaya requirement pe jaiye
Customer: requirement ha search ke ha uske baad category pe click kijiye
Customer: category ha ab waha pe search kijiye sir dried fruit roasting machine jo maine likh kar ke bheja hai aapko D R I E D okay okay ek minute ha ha
Customer: okay search kiya ho gaya
Customer: hello
Executive: hanji sir hanji hanji ha search kiya ab search karne ke baad dried fruit roasting machine ke sari inquiry open ho gayi hogi aapke pass
Customer: ha almond roaster automatic machine ha bas bas aap ek teen char ek ek karke inquiry open karke us pe teen teen char char reply kar dijiye
Executive: kam se kam char ha wapas se kar dijiye jaise pehle ek bar kara tha na aapne jaise maine bataya tha
Customer: category me dried fruit roasting machine hi search kiya na aapne ha ha ha theek hai fir char inquiry open kar dijiye matlab ek ek karke char inquiry open kijiye us pe teen teen char char reply kar dijiye
Customer: ye teen teen char char compulsory hai ek message pe nahi nahi teen teen char char compulsory hai sir aise se nahi hoga
Customer: sahi puch raha hun ha sir
Customer: kya keh rahe sir
Customer: ho gaya ho gaya ab ek bar by lead pe aaiyega bas ek minute aur lunga last hai ye
Customer: by lead
Executive: recent lead pe click kijiye
Customer: hmm ho gaya pehla acha ye 50 kg ka hai food dehydrator ka isko rehne dijiye dusra mobile paddy dryer aa raha hoga usko bhi rehne dijiye wo aapko delete hai ek aa raha hoga high speed vegetable drying machine commercial isko bhi rehne dijiye dikh raha hai aapko ye sab jo main bol raha hun
Customer: ha ha ha dikh raha hai ek peanut roaster aa raha hoga Kanpur Uttar Pradesh ka sir char minute pehle ka isko purchase kar lijiye ye aapke kam ke liye hai
Executive: okay kar diya purchase kar liya ha message dal dijiye sath ke sath
Customer: ho gaya ab ek ek bar aur by lead pe aaiyega
Executive: hmm ye aapne pata kiya tha kya hum batch type me deal karte hain ya tray type me ya dono me
Customer: na back wo back me tray me nahi karte acha tray me nahi karte batch type me karte hain na
Executive: hmm theek hai theek hai abhi to filhal dehydration plant ki jyada lead nahi hai wo lead thi to maine purchase karwa di baki aap ek bar kal mere se video meeting kijiye main aur bhi lead vagaira purchase kara dunga aapko
Customer: okay dekha puchiye puchiye puchiye export ka option export ka option aata hai usme nahi kar sakte hum
Executive: actually hamara jo package chal raha hai na Vedant ji wo hamara domestic ka package chal raha hai theek hai matlab hum sirf India ki lead purchase kar sakte hain export ka package hum export ka lead hum isliye nahi purchase kar sakte kyunki hamara export ka koi bhi plan nahi chal raha wo bhi uska bhi subscription model pe kam karta hai uske liye aapko alag se investment karna padega matlab hamara India mart ka export ka plan kharidna padega tab ja ke aap export ke lead purchase kar sakte hain
Customer: okay to meri baat hui thi Tushar sir se unhone bola tha ki main baad me bhi karunga iska export ka to meri aap pehle isko domestic ka aap use karna chalu kar dijiye taki main sir se baat kar paun export ke bare me
Executive: ha ha theek hai theek hai ha ha kal main kitne baje connect kar lun aapko
Customer: main aapko shamne se karunga
Executive: done done done theek hai sir ha okay thank you
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer purchased incorrect leads (tunnel dryer).

- Wants to know about export options.



Resolution:

- Executive guided to exclude tunnel dryer category.

- Guided to search and reply to relevant inquiries.

- Suggested a peanut roaster lead for purchase.

- Explained domestic package limitations for export leads.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will have a video meeting tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, tunnel dryer, category preference, export
